sentences.en: A number of staircases ascend from the cobbled streets onto the ramparts.
sentences.cn: 一段石阶从鹅卵石路上一直向上直通城墙。

sentences.en: Dolphin - whale or nature kingdom grid work cannot ascend human form.
sentences.cn: 海豚鲸鱼或大自然王国的晶格层无法提升人类肉体.

sentences.en: He watched the airplane ascend higher and higher.
sentences.cn: 他看到飞机飞得越来越高.

sentences.en: His ancestors ascend to the 15 th century.
sentences.cn: 他的祖先可上溯到十五世纪.

sentences.en: In a few minutes they heard him ascend the ladder to his own room.
sentences.cn: 过了几分钟,她们听见他上了楼梯,往他自己的屋里去了.

sentences.en: Our inquiries ascend to the remotest antiquity.
sentences.cn: 我们的研究可追溯到远古.

sentences.en: Setting foot on the island, he began to ascend the trail.
sentences.cn: 他踏上荒岛, 开始顺着小径往上攀登.

sentences.en: The path started to ascend more steeply.
The stairs in the Five - Star hotel ascend in a graceful curve.
sentences.cn: 这个 五星级 的酒店楼梯以优美的曲线上升.

sentences.en: The white road seemed to ascend and diminish till it joined the sky.
sentences.cn: 那条白色的大路本身就往前伸展,越远越高,越远越细,最后仿佛和天空相连.

sentences.en: Then we ascend steeply through forests of rhododendron.
sentences.cn: 然后我们在杜鹃花丛中沿着陡坡向上爬。

sentences.en: Thence, bending to our left, we began to ascend the slope towards the plateau.
sentences.cn: 我们从那里向左拐, 开始攀登通向台地的斜坡.

sentences.en: They move freely from one department to another as they ascend the civil service ladder.
sentences.cn: 随着仕途晋升，他们可以在部门间随意调动。

sentences.en: We see what we explore, our minds ascend a palpable ladder of causes and effects.
sentences.cn: 我们看得见我们勘探的事物, 我们的思想沿着层次分明的原因和结果逐步往上探索.

sentences.en: We watched the airplane ascend higher and higher.
sentences.cn: 我们看着飞机逐渐升高.

sentences.en: Without a word, he began to ascend the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他没说一句话就上楼梯了。

words.tran_cn: 上升的人或物；字母的上半（或下半）出头部分

trans.tran_en: to move up through the air
to move up through the air
to climb something or move to a higher position
